com.WAT.airbnb.rest.houses

Class HouseControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.WAT.airbnb.rest.houses.HouseControl

  • @Path(value="/house")
public class HouseControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all house operations Paths: /register /search /getnumpages /getpage/{pageNum} /getpredicted /getusershousesmin /gethouse/{houseId} - Method POST /gethouse/{houseId} - Method GET /updatehouse/{houseId} /uploadphoto/{houseId}

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HouseControl() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getHouse(int houseId) 
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getHousePost(int houseId, java.lang.String token)
      If we don't have enough data for a user's preferences (comments) we keep track of the fact that they looked at the house in the database (airbnb.searches) We differentiate between the /gethouse/{houseId} paths by the method used (POST - GET)
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getNumPages()
      The size of each page is set to be 8 (defined in com.WAT.airbnb.etc.Constants$PAGE_SIZE)
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPage(int pageNum) 
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPredicted(java.lang.String token)
      Performs the NNCF algorithm to predict houses the user might be interested in
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getUsersHousesMin(java.lang.String token) 
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerHouse(java.io.InputStream uploadedFileInputStream, org.glassfish.jersey.media.multipart.FormDataContentDisposition fileDetails, java.lang.String token, java.lang.String jsonString)
      Allows the user to register a new house and upload exactly one photograph for it (the one shown in the thumbnail)
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response searchHouse(java.lang.String json)
      Searches for houses matching the given JSON
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateHouse(int houseId, java.lang.String json)
      Updates the specified house with according to the JSON input
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response uploadPicture(java.io.InputStream uploadedInputStream, org.glassfish.jersey.media.multipart.FormDataContentDisposition fileDetails, java.lang.String token, int houseID)
      Allows the user to upload more photos for their house

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

 @POST
 @Consumes(value="multipart/form-data")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response registerHouse(java.io.InputStream uploadedFileInputStream,

                                                                                                                       java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String jsonString)
        Allows the user to register a new house and upload exactly one photograph for it (the one shown in the thumbnail)

      • searchHouse

        @Path(value="/search")
 @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response searchHouse(java.lang.String json)
        Searches for houses matching the given JSON
        Returns:
        A list of (minified) houses along with their thumbnail picture.

      • getNumPages

        @Path(value="/getnumpages")
 @GET
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getNumPages()
        The size of each page is set to be 8 (defined in com.WAT.airbnb.etc.Constants$PAGE_SIZE)
        Returns:
        The number of pages (Overall number of houses / PAGE_SIZE (=8)).

      • getPage

        @Path(value="/getpage/{pagenum}")
 @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPage(@PathParam(value="pagenum")
                                                                                                                      int pageNum)
        Returns:
        A list of PAGE_SIZE (=8) minified houses

      • getPredicted

        @Path(value="/getpredicted")
 @POST
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getPredicted(java.lang.String token)
        Performs the NNCF algorithm to predict houses the user might be interested in
        Returns:
        A list of 4 minified suggested houses

      • getUsersHousesMin

        @Path(value="/getusershousesmin")
 @POST
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getUsersHousesMin(java.lang.String token)
        Returns:
        The list of minified houses that the user has put up for renting

      • getHousePost

        @Path(value="/gethouse/{houseId}")
 @POST
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getHousePost(@PathParam(value="houseId")
                                                                                                                                                            int houseId,
                                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String token)
        If we don't have enough data for a user's preferences (comments) we keep track of the fact that they looked at the house in the database (airbnb.searches) We differentiate between the /gethouse/{houseId} paths by the method used (POST - GET)
        Returns:
        All of the specified house's information

      • getHouse

        @Path(value="/gethouse/{houseid}")
 @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getHouse(@PathParam(value="houseid")
                                                                                                                        int houseId)
        Returns:
        The specified house's information and a list of dates that the house is not available
